00014 include '../includes/common.php';
00015 global $booPage; // keep global or WordPress get_header() will fail
00016 $booPage = new Boo_Page;
00017 $booPage->setTemplate('wordpress');
00018 $booPage->setTitle(wp_title('-', false, 'right') . get_bloginfo('name'));
00019 
00020 get_header();
00021 ?>
00022 <div id="main" class="clearfix">
00023     <div class="col-left col clearfix">
00024     
00025         <?php if (have_posts()): ?>
00026             <?php while (have_posts()): the_post(); ?>
00027                 
00028                 <div class="box-wp-post box-wp box clearfix <?php get_post_class(); ?>" id="post-<?php the_ID(); ?>">
00029                     <div class="head clearfix">
00030                         <h1><a href="<?php the_permalink(); ?>" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to <?php the_title_attribute(); ?>"><?php the_title(); ?></a></h1>
00031                         <small><?php the_time('F jS, Y'); ?> <!-- by <?php the_author() ?> --></small>
00032                     </div>
00033                     <div class="body clearfix">
00034                         <div class="wp-entry">
00035                             <?php the_content('Read more...'); ?>
00036                         </div>
00037                     </div>
00038                     <div class="foot clearfix">
00039                         <p class="wp-post-metadata">
00040                             <?php the_tags('Tags: ', ', ', '<br />'); ?> Posted in <?php the_category(', '); ?> | <?php edit_post_link('Edit', '', ' | '); ?> 
00041                             <?php comments_popup_link('No Comments', '1 Comment', '% Comments'); ?>
00042                         </p>
00043                     </div>
00044                 </div>
00045             <?php endwhile; ?>
00046             <div class="box-wp box clearfix">
00047                 <div class="body clearfix">
00048                     <p>
00049                         This entry was posted
00050                         <?php /* This is commented, because it requires a little adjusting sometimes.
00051                             You'll need to download this plugin, and follow the instructions:
00052                             http://binarybonsai.com/archives/2004/08/17/time-since-plugin/ */
00053                             /* $entry_datetime = abs(strtotime($post->post_date) - (60*120)); echo time_since($entry_datetime); echo ' ago'; */ ?>
00054                         on <?php the_time('l, F jS, Y') ?> at <?php the_time() ?>
00055                         and is filed under <?php the_category(', ') ?>.
00056                         You can follow any responses to this entry through the <?php post_comments_feed_link('RSS 2.0'); ?> feed.
00057 
00058                         <?php if (('open' == $post-> comment_status) && ('open' == $post->ping_status)) {
00059                             // Both Comments and Pings are open ?>
00060                             You can <a href="#respond">leave a response</a>, or <a href="<?php trackback_url(); ?>" rel="trackback">trackback</a> from your own site.
00061 
00062                         <?php } elseif (!('open' == $post-> comment_status) && ('open' == $post->ping_status)) {
00063                             // Only Pings are Open ?>
00064                             Responses are currently closed, but you can <a href="<?php trackback_url(); ?> " rel="trackback">trackback</a> from your own site.
00065 
00066                         <?php } elseif (('open' == $post-> comment_status) && !('open' == $post->ping_status)) {
00067                             // Comments are open, Pings are not ?>
00068                             You can skip to the end and leave a response. Pinging is currently not allowed.
00069 
00070                         <?php } elseif (!('open' == $post-> comment_status) && !('open' == $post->ping_status)) {
00071                             // Neither Comments, nor Pings are open ?>
00072                             Both comments and pings are currently closed.
00073 
00074                         <?php } edit_post_link('Edit this entry','','.'); ?>
00075                     </p>
00076                 </div>
00077             </div>
00078             <?php comments_template(); ?>
00079         <?php else: ?>
00080             <div class="box-wp box clearfix">
00081                 <div class="head clearfix">
00082                     <h1>Not Found</h1>
00083                 </div>
00084                 <div class="body clearfix">
00085                     <p>Sorry, but you are looking for something that isn't here.</p>
00086                     <?php get_search_form(); ?>
00087                 </div>
